overview: The opening edition of this new series can pretty much be summed up by its title. Bodacious black women are joined by well-equipped white hunks in scene after scene of interracial sexual excess. Director David Luger captures it all in perfectly clear video that helps make this one a must-see for fans of the genre. Right from the opening bell, it's clear that this video is something special.
title: White Dicks Black Chicks
